knimeNode.name: Snowflake H2O MOJO Predictor (Regression)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a database connection to Snowflake.

fullDescription.intro:
This node creates a connection to a Snowflake database using the selected Snowflake JDBC driver. For further information about Snowflake see the Snowflake documentation.
This node uses the selected driver's JDBC URL template to create the concrete database URL. Field validation in the dialog depends on whether the (included) tokens referencing them are mandatory or optional in the template.

tab.name: Settings
tab.description: This tab allows you to define rules to map from KNIME types to database types.
tab.option: Change the name of the prediction column.

ports.inPort: The MOJO. Its model category must be regression.
The DB Data object that should be used for prediction
ports.outPort: The input DB Data object enhanced with the prediction results.
